Title: Had a dream where I met @paulg and asked about his two sons and he told me he actually has 5 kids he...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: Had a dream where I met @paulg and asked about his two sons and he told me he actually has 5 kids he just only tweets about 2 of them. Also I could tell from his body language he didn't want to make small talk, he was just being polite.
